plot: Elias, an aging faith healer, is unable to save the life of a little girl. The girl's parents take justice into their own hands and poison Elias. Elias suffers from haunting visions of the girl as he slowly passes into the afterlife.
title: El sueño de Elias
plot_es: Elias, an aging faith healer, is unable to save the life of a little girl. The girl's parents take justice into their own hands and poison Elias. Elias suffers from haunting visions of the girl as he slowly passes into the afterlife.
plot_en: Elias, an aging faith healer, is unable to save the life of a little girl. The girl's parents take justice into their own hands and poison Elias. Elias suffers from haunting visions of the girl as he slowly passes into the afterlife.
